description: Show equipment movement stop completion details
permissions: Admin users can view all equipment movement stop completions. Non-admin users can view records scoped to equipment movement trips where the trip broker is in their broker memberships, or where the trip is linked to a job production plan with a shift whose seller operations contact is the user, or where the trip is linked to a broker tender for truckers managed by the user.
validation_notes: The stop completion ID argument is required.
